dialog_about.title: About
dialog_about.warning_medical_device: According to EU guidance document MDCG 2019-11 and the MD Borderline Manual, Perennity is not qualified as a Medical Device as it performs no action on data different from storage, archival, communication or simple search. The default embedded DICOM viewer is not certified for diagnostic usage.

messages.settings_changed: Your settings have changed. Please restart Perennity for these changes to take effect!

restart_perennity.success: Perennity Services have been restarted successfully!
